item.description:
For those of you who haven't been to my house, you'll soon learn that my yard is FILLED with berries!

Come on over and pick all the berries you want! There's more than I could ever use on my own! Here are the berries currently lurking throughout my backyard and along my hidden path:

1. BLACKBERRIES!
2. RASPBERRIES!
3. BLUEBERRIES!

It's coming towards the end of the raspberries and the start of the blackberries, so it should be a good weekend to pick. Also, I've found some random blueberries, but they take a little bit more work to find! They aren't all ready yet.

I hope too see you there!

Please bring:
1. Your own bowls to pick berries in!
2. Something to carry your berries home in (bowl, plastic container, etc!)
item.name: Last Minute Meetup! Berry Picking!
